name: dcadec
description: DTS Coherent Acoustics decoder with support for HD extensions

repo.name: dcadec
repo.description: DTS Coherent Acoustics decoder with support for HD extensions

readme.summary: Clear purpose and excellent usage examples, but completely missing installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions provided - users don't know how to build or obtain the dcadec binary before using it

critical_findings: No validation of input data can lead to potential security vulnerabilities
Error handling may expose internal details
security.summary: The code appears to be generally secure, but lacks robust input validation and error handling mechanisms.

common_complaints: Lack of standalone decoder after FFmpeg integration
Downmixing audio produces distortion and overflow issues
Missing test files in release tarballs
Undefined behavior and buffer overflow bugs
praise_themes: Interest in new features (encoder, DTS Express support)
sentiment.summary: The dcadec project shows signs of abandonment with multiple unresolved technical issues spanning 9+ years, slow/absent maintainer responses, and several critical bugs remaining unfixed despite community engagement.

red_flags: Occasional dismissive tone towards new contributors
Some responses could be more detailed for beginners
communication.summary: The maintainer provides useful information but could improve clarity and patience with less experienced users.

concerns: No commits in over 6 years (last commit December 2019)
18 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
No merged PRs or commits in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
Zero closed issues in past 6 months indicates no maintenance activity
maintenance.summary: This package is abandoned with no maintenance activity for over 6 years, accumulating unresolved issues without any development effort.

changelog.summary: The changelog is well-categorized but lacks information on breaking changes and migration guides, making it incomplete and somewhat unclear.

project_metrics.description: DTS Coherent Acoustics decoder with support for HD extensions

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides clear and detailed information about the package's features and usage, but lacks installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: No commits in the past six months
No merged PRs in the past six months
Last release was over five years ago
Docs: Installation instructions are not provided
Community: missing test files in release tarballs
Communication: Occasional dismissive tone towards new contributors
Communication: Some responses could be more detailed for beginners
Security: No validation of input data can lead to potential security vulnerabilities
Security: Error handling may expose internal details
High bus factor risk (96% from top contributor)
highlights: Six contributors have been active in the past six months
